com.dautelle.xml.sax
Class XMLReaderImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.dautelle.xml.sax.XMLReaderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.xml.sax.XMLReader
public final class XMLReaderImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.XMLReader

This class provides a SAX2-compliant parser wrapping a RealtimeParser.

See SAXParserFactoryImpl for Plug-In Installation:

Version:
4.5, May 26, 2003
Author:
Jean-Marie Dautelle
